replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Talon12,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=KQHsX9NZ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-10-24T13:46:14.306+0000)
>
> why quality so bad

OP is recording with a phone, not gameplay, he's using a camera to record the screen, lol.

thought was external device, just the way is didn't move at all, not even slightly made me not sure, so I didn't say anything. Was actually going to say use an actual recording program when I first went to reply, but I wasn't sure, so I asked why the quality so bad instead.
